CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1946, pg. 32, reads: Hometown Stars Scintillate Over Pittsburgh... Music Masters - Errol [Erroll] Garner, whose spectacular piano playing has skyrocketed him to fame and Ethel Ramos Harris, an accomplished performer discuss the thrill of mastering the 88's and how 'music hath charms.'"Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, St. Louis edition, August 16, 1947, pg. 16, reads: "Scenes From Night Of Stars - The Syria Mosque in Pittsburgh was packed to the rafters Monday night for the Frogs' "Night of Stars."...Center: Errol Garner, piano star, awaits his turn to go on stage...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Erroll Garner and Ethel Ramos Harris standing in hallway of Syria Mosque for Night of Stars
